snippet: This week, a C-47 aircraft known as the Whiskey 7 will take off in central New York and head to France for the 70th anniversary of the storming of Normandy.
abstract: C-47 military aircraft known as Whiskey 7 is set to take off in central New York and head to France for 70th anniversary of the storming of Normandy; five-person, all-volunteer aircrew is making trans-Atlantic crossing to pay tribute to American soldiers who were killed in World War II.
lead_paragraph: This week, a C-47 aircraft known as the Whiskey 7 will take off in central New York and head to France for the 70th anniversary of the storming of Normandy.

headline.main: Preparing a Veteran of D-Day for Its Return to Normandy
headline.print_headline: Preparing a Veteran of D-Day for Its Return to Normandy

keywords.value: United States Defense and Military Forces
